resources.name: [parameters('bastionHostName')]

subnet.id: [resourceId('Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('vnetName'), variables('subnetName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('vnetName'), variables('subnetName')), '/')[1])]

dependsOn: [resourceId('Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('vnetName'), variables('subnetName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('vnetName'), variables('subnetName')), '/')[1])]
